content: Hey all; I uploaded the FHIR IPS IG from Github (as of this morning) to the Inferno stand-alone validator. Now you should be able to validate resources against the IPS IG by going to https://inferno.healthit.gov/validator/ , putting your resource in, then opening the "advanced options" tab and selecting hl7.fhir.uv.ips as the IG, and your profile as the profile
Right now it can only validate single resources (aka: not the Bundle with all the IPS resources)
Let me know if you have any issues with it, or you can think of anything you'd like to see; the stand-alone validator is pretty new and we're looking for feedback/issue reports!
Also, I've stopped work for the moment on the US Core to IPS converter, with the hope of trying to fix some of the validator issues on the inferno Validator

@Michael O'Keefe Could you please check and update if needed the current draft of the IPS track report https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=90899811#id-202009InternationalPatientSummaryTrack-TrackReportOut(draft)
